actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

official_title: To amend the Communications Act of 1934 to prohibit mobile service providers from providing service on smart phones that have been reported stolen, to require smart phones to be equipped with anti-theft functionality and mobile device identification numbers, and to prohibit the alteration or removal of mobile device identification numbers of smart phones, and for other purposes.
short_title: Cell Phone Theft Prevention Act of 2016

titles.title: Cell Phone Theft Prevention Act of 2016

To amend the Communications Act of 1934 to prohibit mobile service providers from providing service on smart phones that have been reported stolen, to require smart phones to be equipped with anti-theft functionality and mobile device identification numbers, and to prohibit the alteration or removal of mobile device identification numbers of smart phones, and for other purposes.
Cell Phone Theft Prevention Act of 2016
